g++ -g -DVALGRIND -DCHECK_PTHREAD_RETURN_VALUE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Wno-reorder -Wno-conversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-sign-compare -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-shadow -Wpointer-arith -Wno-write-strings -Wno-format -march=native -std=c++11 -rdynamic -O0 -rdynamic CMakeFiles/kafka.dir/kafkaproducer.cpp.o -o ../../bin/kafka  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib64 /usr/local/lib64/librdkafka++.so
